Web Appendix A: Data and model moments Estimation is based on all 18 yearly waves of the British Household Panel Survey (BHPS), covering the period from 1991 to 2008. Apart from those who are lost through attrition, all families in the original 1991 sample and subsequent booster samples remain in the panel from then onwards.
